#IF(game.getCharactersPresent().contains(meraxis)) Approach Meraxis and say hello to her. #ELSE Meraxis isn't here at the moment... #ENDIF
Say goodbye to Meraxis and [pc.step] back into the tavern.

#IF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_meraxis_duel_daily_complete)) As you and Meraxis have already duelled one another today, you'll have to wait until tomorrow to do it again... #ELSE Accept Meraxis's offer of a duel. #ENDIF

[style.italicsDemon(This will permanently transform Meraxis into a full demon!)]

scene.author: Innoxia
scene.title: Finished
scene.tooltip: You and Meraxis have finished having sex...

response.responseTooltip: Leave Meraxis's room and continue on your way...
Head up the staircase to the upper floor of the tavern.

scene.title: Finished

response.responseTooltip: Leave Jess's room and continue on your way...

Use the sinks to wash your [pc.hands] and face.
[style.italicsGood(This will clean all inventory slots associated with head and hand slots, as well as any clothing worn in these slots.)]
